title: Mayura Manjari Jhumka: Peacock Coral & Tanzanite Drop Earrings
materials: and Diamond accents. Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting luster.
features: Intricate Peacock (Mayura) design, symbolic of beauty and grace. The peacock's feathers are adorned with sparkling diamonds. A vibrant coral and tanzanite drop adds a playful and contemporary touch to this traditional design. High-quality gemstone settings ensure durability and sparkle.
colors: and a touch of Emerald green are complemented by the brilliance of diamonds
occasions: Perfect for special occasions like weddings
and even a touch of elegance to your everyday look. A stunning choice for Seemantham or a Half-Saree function.
description: A stunning blend of traditional South Indian design and modern gemstone choices. The Mayura motif symbolizes beauty and grace, making it a meaningful piece to own. The vibrant colors and quality craftsmanship ensure it will be a cherished heirloom for generations to come. Handcrafted in Hyderabad with exquisite attention to detail.
